definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

sentences.english: Hiccup is a brief involuntary inspiratory movement followed by glottal closure.
sentences.chinese: 呃逆是一个简短的自愿吸气运动其次是声门关闭。

sentences.english: He suddenly had an attack of the hiccups.
Objective To investigate the effect of Diamox for intractable hiccup after cerebrovascular diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察乙酰唑胺对脑血管病后顽固性呃逆的疗效。

sentences.english: A case is described of diabolic hiccup due to a unilateral lesion of nucleus tractus solitarius in the brainstem.
sentences.chinese: 案件描述的毒辣呃逆由于单方面病变的孤束核在脑干。

sentences.english: Conclusion Diamox is an effective medicine for intractable hiccup.
sentences.chinese: 结论乙酰唑胺是治疗顽固性呃逆较为有效的药物。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the therapeutic effect of Depakin in intractable hiccup after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察德巴金对卒中后顽固性呃逆的疗效。

sentences.english: Taking with tea may induce hiccups or diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 不可与茶同服，若同服亦能引起呃逆。

sentences.english: Transitory hiccup is usually caused by epigastric irritation.
sentences.chinese: 通常是暂时性的呃逆所造成的腹部不适。

sentences.english: Chronic hiccup is an intractable disease and its pathogenesis is still unclear.
sentences.chinese: 慢性呃逆是一不易治疗的疾病，其发生机制尚不明确。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of auricle point applying in the treatment of hiccup after transcatheter arterial chem-embolization (TACE) of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究耳穴点压法治疗肝癌介入术后呃逆的疗效。

sentences.english: On day 3 he developed singultus requiring chlorpromazine .
sentences.chinese: 第3天，他出现呃逆，并需要氯丙嗪治疗。

definition: (TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm
